Fault.name: BPEL/FileReadBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: You should place all explicit <bpel:import> statements in a BPEL 2.0 process.
Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpel:process> "FileReadBPELProcess" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.

Fault.name: BPEL/FileReadBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Fix the process to be *either* durable or synchronous.
Fault.msg: Process "FileReadBPELProcess" is both durable (onMessage,Receive,Wait) and synchronous.

Fault.name: BPEL/FileReadBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: A <receive> or <pick> with createInstance set to "true" must be present.
Fault.msg: There is no start activity in process "FileReadBPELProcess"

Fault.name: BPEL/FileReadBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns4:book" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.

Fault.name: BPEL/FileReadBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns4:book" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.

Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
